name: Luminous (JKUO)
description:
===== This game requires the HTC Vive in order to play ======

Explore worlds with the power of virtual reality. Help to cast away the darkness by growing beautiful crystal sculptures in order to populate your worlds.

Chi Shing Yeung - 3D Art / Environment

Chris Hofmann - Programming

Jack Sullivan - Sound

Justin Kuo - Programming / UX

Neechareee Sangsawang - 3D Art

Sara Asmussen - Programming
